title: Futbol Americas: Transfer Deadline Day Winners & Losers
description:
On Thursday's episode of Futbol Americas, Herculez Gomez and Mauricio Pedroza react to the Deadline Day moves. Who were the winners and losers? Then the guys analyze Tata Martino's comments on the pessimism surrounding El Tri. Next, we recap the midweek action in MLS. Will LAFC choke away the Supporters' Shield? Then USMNT midfielder Gianluca Busio sits down with ESPN Correspondent Sam Borden to discuss his experience at Venezia FC and his chances of making the USMNT World Cup roster.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Herculez Gomez and Mauricio Pedroza react to CONCACAF player transfers
